posts.post_content: I'm sure this card lost a bit of its thunder with the printing of Damnation, but this still eludes indestructibility and regeneration. Only one thing troubles me about Mutilate: it seems like it would be noticeably weak in multi-colored decks unless you use Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth.
